ComicInfo.Title: The Sting; A Time for Heroes; Got Yer Number; Dances with Pitbulls; Don't Go There
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Sting: Newt continues to get taken for all his gold by the other members of the group.
A Time for Heroes: The group tries a new gaming supplement for their Heroes and Zeroes game.
Got Yer Number: Bob purchases a business card that happens to have Hard 8's president and founder Gary Jackson's personal phone number on it.
Dances with Pitbulls: The group meets to game at Sarah's house. Their band is beset by 375 pitbulls.
Don't Go There: B.A. announces that the group has to find a new place to play the next week.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:14:20. [CVDB190743] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-14 06:59:08. [Issue ID 89642]
ComicInfo.Characters: Newt Forager,Pete Ashton,Gordo Sheckberry,Stevil Van Hostle,Victor Ferguson
ComicInfo.Teams: The Knights of the Dinner Table,Black Hand Gaming Society
